title: MOBILE APPLICATION DEVELOPER (Android developer)
jobDescription:
An Android developer is responsible for designing, developing and maintaining mobile applications for the Android platform. They work with Java or Kotlin programming languages and Android Software Development Kit (SDK) to create innovative and user-friendly applications.

Other key responsibilities include:

  • Writing clean, maintainable and efficient code
  • Designing and implementing app features
  • Debugging and fixing bugs
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver end-to-end mobile solutions
  • Staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologiesStrong problem-solving and communication skills are also necessary

title: Mobile Application Developer
jobDescription:
The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, testing, and debugging mobile apps using flutter. Develop and deploy front-end mobile features and functionalities and build reusable components and libraries for future use.

Responsibilities:

1) Develop and deploy front-end mobile features and functionalities and build reusable components and libraries for future use.
2) Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code and optimise components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
3) Construct visualisations that are able to depict vast amounts of data and develop a flexible and well-structured front-end architecture, along with the APIs to support it.
4) Strong understanding of REST APIs

5) Familiarity with Bloc Architecture

jobDescription:
Mobile application developer should be comfortable working with the flutter SDK along with RESTful Webservices implementation.


Primary Skills : Flutter SDK, Third-Party API implementation, Dart programming language and Unit Testing.

Job Description :
 
We are looking for a Mobile Application Developer who has familiarity with the Software Development Life Cycle, the ability to use management tools like Jira. Practical experience in developing Android/iOS applications using Flutter. Work closely with the QA team. Collaborate with product owners and business analysts to transform evolving requirements into working applications that meet the business and usability needs.
 
They should participate in product design meetings, communicate with product owners, analysts, and end-users daily to deliver technology solutions that meet the project and operational objectives. Implement continuous improvement changes for the application, integrated system, toolset, and the development environment.

Responsiblities :
  • Design, develop, deploy and support world-class, enterprise-level products.
  • Provide estimates to the required level of accuracy for stories and tasks.
  • Must have work experience with Flutter SDK and Dart programming language.
  • Strong knowledge of Flutter widgets like for iOS and Material Components for Android.
  • Experience in working on mobile platforms like Android/iOS is required.
  • Experienced in building mobile applications that utilize web services (SOAP / REST / JSON / GSON).
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
  • Good knowledge of database (MySQL, PostgreSQL).
  • Knowledge on app publish to play store and appstore. .

title: MOBILE APPLICATION DEVELOPER (iOS developer)
jobDescription:
• Application Development: Create, develop, and maintain iOS applications using programming languages like Swift and Objective-C
  • UI/UX Design: Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user interfaces that are visually appealing, intuitive, and responsive
  • Coding: Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code, and be able to troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise
  • App Testing: Conduct rigorous testing to identify and fix bugs, ensuring the application is stable and functional
  • API Integration: Integrate third-party APIs and services, such as social media integration, payment gateways, and cloud services, into the mobile application
  • Performance Optimization: Optimize the application's performance, including factors like speed, responsiveness, and battery efficiency
  • Version Control: Use version control systems like Git to manage source code and collaborate with other developers
  • App Store Submission: Prepare applications for submission to the Apple App Store, including adhering to Apple's guidelines and requirements

ambitionBoxData.Title: Gedu Services Private Limited Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Position Summary:

We are seeking a candidate who can be part of the GEDU IT Engineering Team at GEDU Noida. The person should have idea of delivering least one to two projects during their professional career. He/she should have good communication skills. He/she should be able to work in coordination within the team of 6-8 members. He/she should be focused and eager to learn and work on new technologies as required by the organization. He/she should be a quick learner and ready to deliver with the team as required by the organization.


Required Skills and Qualifications:

  • Write well designed, efficient code that works across devices
  • Development and management a robust React Native application for both iOS and Android
  • Improve product code quality and write effective unit tests
  • Collaborate with product team to build new features
  • Build reusable front end components with various levels of abstraction
  • Take full ownership and be accountable for all mobile app processes
  • Excellent Communication Skills- both written and verbal.
  • Ready to work in a start-up culture.
  • Idea of entire SDLC process.
  • The ability to learn new technologies quickly.
  • An analytical mind.
  • The ability to communicate complex procedures to other colleagues.
  • Multiplatform Front End Development React.
  • Must have React JS experience, worked on Native React projects.

Good to have Skills and Qualifications:

  • Good to have hands on React Native Development experience
  • Good to have hands on in type script and java script
  • Good to have Experience in REACT tools including React JS, Redux and Flux Experience with native development Android or iOS would be a plus
  • Good to have Experience integrating with REST APIs
  • Good to have Experience with user interface design.
  • Knowledge of Agile Kanban etc.

Experience:

  • 5 yrs

Educational Qualification(s):

  • BE/B. Tech/MCA/M. Tech or equivalent.
